name: The Great Ocean
summary: Dive into an adventure in the earth’s oceans. Explore in your high-tech submarine fascinating spots like the Galapagos, the Arctic, Cozumel island or the WW2 German battlecruiser Scharnhorst. Swim with majestic whales, sharks and sea turtles. Solve quests using your upgradeable tools: Cut with the laser to free jailed whales or entangled turtles, use the scanner for details on over 100 species, use the welder to repair subsea cables and the beam grabber to collect pieces of the infamous nuclear...
